subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A prediction from a crystal ball that is a cracked and foggy receptacle of hopes and fears: The Mets will break the .500 mark, perhaps standing in the sunlight of 84 wins.
snippet: A prediction from a crystal ball that is a cracked and foggy receptacle of hopes and fears: The Mets will break the .500 mark, perhaps standing in the sunlight of 84 wins.
